subject: Relationships

description: Learn Intermittent Reinforcement: The Slot Machine in one minute.

hook.text: He's cruel Monday, kind Tuesday, absent Wednesday, loving Thursday. You never know which version you'll get.

discovery.text: Slot machines use it. So do toxic partners. Random kindness after cruelty creates obsessive emotional bonds.

twist.text: Victims describe the good days as 'worth it.' That's not love â€” it's the same brain pattern as gambling addiction.

climax.text: Consistent cruelty is easier to leave than random cruelty mixed with kindness. Unpredictability is the real trap.

punchline.text: Random kindness after cruelty isn't love. It's the mechanism of addiction.

quiz.question: Why is intermittent reinforcement so powerful?
options: Unpredictable rewards create the strongest emotional bonds
